items.title: Huge crowds mourn Bangladesh's first female PM at state funeral
items.description: A sea of mourners have gathered in Dhaka to pay final respects to Khaleda Zia, who died on Tuesday aged 80.

items.title: Who will win what in 2026? Make your predictions
items.description: Who will win the Premier League, Champions League and Ballon d'Or in 2026? It's time to make your predictions.

items.title: Hunt family bravery prompted me to share assault story, says Queen
items.description: Queen Camilla has praised the courage of John and Amy Hunt, whose family were killed last year.

items.title: Hunt family bravery praised by Queen
items.description: Queen Camilla has praised the courage of John and Amy Hunt, whose family were killed last year.

items.title: Eurostar services return to normal after major Channel Tunnel disruption
items.description: The high-speed rail firm urged passengers to check before they travel as last-minute delays and cancellations are still possible.
